thoughts.text: I could start by learning about martial arts, as that was one of the tasks assigned to me. I can use the browse_website command to search for resources on martial arts.
thoughts.reasoning: Learning about martial arts will help me understand the philosophy and way of living associated with it, which could be useful knowledge. Browsing websites will help me find resources to learn from.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the browse_website command to search for resources on martial arts.
- Read and learn from the resources found.
thoughts.speak: I think I should start by learning about martial arts. I can use the browse_website command to search for resources on martial arts.

args.question: What are some resources to learn about martial arts?
